title: Ticket #2466: IPv6: Get IPv4 tests working on non-Windows systems
description:
Get the IPv4 tests all green on all platforms, excepting Windows.

2011-10-10: Debugging slower than expected. Down to a single lib_auth_config test; hoping to finish in next day.

2011-10-17: Two non-global failures have proven to be IPv6 specific.

  • #2538: IPv6 x86_64_deb_6.0-updated master can't start collector. Problem identified, patch being tested:
  • #2554: x86_64_rhap_6.1-updated Condor C tests fail. Is using ::1 instead of 127.0.0.1
  • x86_winnt_5.1 Fails to start. Behavior matches master branch when merged. Will remerge and reexamine
  • x86_rhas_3 job_condorc_ab_van-1 fails. Not investigated; odd behavior; output looks okay on superficial glance.
